May we chat for a minute when you get home? Everything was awesome yesterday. Now it’s not. I have not been around him at all. He has only been
in your company and he won’t seem to talk to me.
We have made our problem the kids problem. No matter how awful you think I am, it’s not right. I have begged to speak with one voice since this
started. They don’t even know about the divorce.
I’d like to sync tonight.
